description: This Java class 'UserMapper' extends a base mapper class and provides conversion methods between 'UserEntity' and 'User' DTO objects, utilizing Spring's BeanUtils for property copying.

classes.name: UserMapper
classes.description: A mapper class responsible for converting between User entity and User DTO.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a User DTO to a UserEntity by copying properties via BeanUtils.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a UserEntity to a User DTO by copying properties via BeanUtils.
